title: Account Hacked..?
body:
My account was recently hacked or logged into by someone who spent all my IP and changed my summoner name, masteries, and runes. I sent a ticket to the support but am making a Boards post to garner more attention and warn people to safeguard their accounts.

I'm also wondering if I can have my name changed back to what it was before.

replies.body: We'll be able to help out with any damage the hacker might have done in your ticket! Once you're verified, those account agents will go through and undo anything the hacker might have done, as well as restoring any spent IP/RP.
That's aweome! Many thanks for the reply.
